transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello. Hello. Good evening, ma'am. Kaisi hain aap?
Customer: Good evening. Badhiya. Bataiye.
Executive: Ma'am, main IndiaMART head office se baat kar raha hun. Main, account manager.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Actually, ma'am, I think abhi aapne hamari ek executive Vijay Tomar ji se baat kari thi ki aapko kuch problem aa raha hai IndiaMART ki services mein. Aapko kuch cheez karni hai jo aap chahti hain ki hum aapko guide karein. Toh mujhe bataengi ma'am ek baar?
Customer: Is number se toh koi baat nahi hui thi. Ek second main confirm kar leti hun. Bhavna tumhari kisi baat hui thi kya IndiaMART se? Ek second. Main baat kar rahi hun.
Executive: Bhavna ji ne call kara hai. Usko maine abhi call number actually busy tha.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Good evening. Bhavna ji, kaisi hain aap?
Customer: Main theek hun sir. Aap bataiye.
Executive: Ma'am, main bhi theek hun. Aap puchne ke liye shukriya. Ma'am, abhi aap mujhe bata sakti hain aap kya chahti thi ki aap lead manager ke through kar sakein? Ek baar aap mujhe batayein because jo Green Energy Solutions hai usko main handle kar raha hun IndiaMART ki taraf se. Main account manager hun ma'am. Toh mujhe bataiye aap.
Customer: Haan sir. Isme hum chahte the na ki jo hamare jo IndiaMART se hume leads aati hai.
Executive: Ji ma'am.
Customer: Toh woh hamare ek internal software hai. Wahan pe woh connect ho jaye. Taki wahan se hamari leads na automatically sales aur marketing team ko send ho jati hai woh.
Executive: Okay, okay. Toh ma'am aap apne internal software yani ki koi CRM software hai kya ma'am?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Toh ma'am iske liye na ma'am IndiaMART mein main aapko bataun ek API aapko purchase karni hogi. Us API ko aapko apne CRM software se integrate karna hoga. And then uske baad jo bhi aap lead consume karenge IndiaMART ke through ya jis bhi customer ka aapko call aayega toh woh sara data automatically aapke CRM software mein transfer ho jayega. And then wahan se aap apni sales team aur marketing team ko woh data share kar sakte ho.
Customer: Okay, theek hai. Toh yeh API purchase karne ke kuch charges rahenge?
Executive: Yes ma'am. Purchase iska purchasing price hai ma'am iska 10,000 kuch hai. Toh use purchase karne ke baad aapka lead manager jo hai aur aapka jo CRM hai dono ek dusre se merge ho jayenge ma'am. Jisse aap easily sara data transfer kar payenge.
Customer: Theek hai. Toh aap mujhe quotation share kar denge iske liye?
Executive: Definitely ma'am. And ma'am aapse ek cheez puchni thi Bhavna ji ki aap jo Green Energy Solutions hai iski services aap bhi handle kar rahi hain?
Customer: Iski services jo abhi is page ko dekh rahe hain hamare end se woh Amit Bisht hai digital marketing ke liye.
Executive: Okay. Toh as a account manager ma'am mujhe sometimes unse connect karne ka zarurat hota hai toh mujhe bata sakte hain ki aap kaun right person hoga IndiaMART ka is page ke liye discussion karne ke liye because sometimes
Customer: Haan toh yeh Amit Bisht hi honge concern person. Aapko unka number share kar deti hun.
Executive: Okay. Toh ma'am may I know your ki aap kya role hai ma'am aapka Green Energy Solutions mein?
Customer: Mera sir sales aur HR ka role hai yahan pe.
Executive: Sales and HR ka role. Theek hai. Toh abhi ma'am aapne hi I think apne number se connect kara tha.
Customer: Haan ji. Maine apne number se hi connect kara tha.
Executive: Theek hai ma'am. Toh main ek kaam karta hun ma'am ki main aapko quotation iska share karwa deta hun. Kis number pe mujhe share karna hai ma'am?
Customer: Aap yeh main aapko Amit ji ka number de rahi hun. Aap usse wohi se usi number pe share kar dijiyega.
Executive: Theek hai ma'am. So abhi jo aapka problem tha jo concern tha woh ma'am main yahan se close kar dun? Aap API purchase karenge usko integrate karenge toh automatically sara data aapke CRM mein transfer ho jayega.
Customer: Theek hai. Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh ma'am ek baar aap mujhe number bata dijiye main line pe hi hun toh main unhe direct yahi se call kar leta hun ek baar.
Customer: 9411.
Executive: 9411
Customer: 02
Executive: Sir 9411
Customer: 02
Executive: 02
Customer: 602
Executive: 602. Ma'am ek baar main repeat karta hun bataiyega. 9411 02602.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh ma'am jo quotation create karke send karna hai woh aapko share karun ya sir ko share karun? Sir ka naam tha Amit.
Customer: Aap kisi bhi number pe share kar dijiye. Woh active rahenge dono number.
Executive: Theek hai. Ma'am ek baar sir ka naam mujhe dobara se bataiyenge? Amit naam tha sir ka?
Customer: Amit Bisht. Haan ji. Amit Bisht.
Executive: Toh ma'am ek baar Amit ji ko connect kar leta hun.
Customer: Ji. Theek hai. Thank you so much.
Customer: Thank you sir.
Executive: Thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants IndiaMART leads to connect to CRM.



Resolution:

- Explained about API purchase and integration process.

- Agreed to share quotation for API purchase.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share quotation with Amit Bisht.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- api, crm, leads, quotation
